7.0.5.name: connect20/Smartsend_Logistics
7.0.5.description: Shipping methods for Post Danmark, GLS, Bring, SwipBox and Posten.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

7.1.0.name: connect20/Smartsend_Logistics
7.1.0.description: Table rate shipping methods with flexible conditions determining the rate and even let the customer chose a pick-up point during checkout. Integrates the shipping methods directly with carrier systems and create PDF labels directly from the backend.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
